mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (id, password, name, phone_num) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNum})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone_num as phoneNum FROM customer where id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET password = #{updatePwd} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE customer SET name = #{updateName} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE customer SET phone_num = #{updatePhoneNum} WHERE id = #{id};
